publ: by 广东美的制冷设备有限公司
name: HolaBrain（formerlyDollinSmart)
0: ”Alexa，set water heater temperature to twenty-eight degree.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: When using Alexa, you need to bind the device in the HolaBrain Smart APP first, so that you can use the Alexa speaker to awaken the bound device. You can say "Alexa, please turn off the water heater" to Alexa, it will turn off the water heater, and the core evoked vocabulary is "turn off the water heater"; or "Alexa, set xxx temperature to 28 degree", it can also To help you set the temperature of a certain device to 28°C, the core evocative vocabulary is "set xxx temperature to 28 degree", where XXX stands for a certain device bound to HolaBrain, using the your name.You can read the detailed instructions for binding Alexa in the HolaBrain APP to help you use it.
